A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was rough..I mean if you have a movie with three primary story arcs and only one of them goes anywhere (just barely) than what is even being accomplished. There is a whole story arc that ends up having no baring on the plot in anyway and certain character choices left you baffled (not in a good way). I still haven't figured out what the story was supposed to be or what was even accomplished. This movie is a pure mess and gets 1.5 stars on the sheer strength on the impressive visuals and good music (albeit recycled music. If you're on the fence about seeing this\, don't.
